#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

A QR code with embedded logo to print on a sticker and put on the NoxDroid


= Details =
The really nice QR generator from [http://www.esponce.com ESponce] allows you to embed images into your QR code. 
Here is one example: https://itu-distributed-systems-2011-a.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/images/qr_ioio_nox.png
